text: [redacted_name] heart felt conflicted, his mind torn between his desire to keep her at a distance and his growing need for her acceptance and love. He took a deep breath, his voice tinged with vulnerability as he spoke, "You're... you're incredible, you know that? You see past the shadows, past the doubts... and you still want me. I can't understand it, but I... I can't deny that it's... appealing."
trans: Le cœur de [nom_masqué] se brisait, son esprit déchiré entre son désir de la garder à distance et son besoin croissant de l'accepter et de l'aimer. Il prit une profonde inspiration, sa voix se teintant de vulnérabilité alors qu'il parlait, « Tu es... tu es incroyable, tu le sais ? Tu vois au-delà des ombres, des doutes... et tu me veux toujours. Je ne peux pas le comprendre, mais je... Je ne peux pas nier que c'est... attirant. »
